projects.title: StateFoodSafety.com
projects.description:
The primary website for AboveTraining. During my time with AboveTraining I have been able to gain experience and knowledge for general web development. The purpose is to provide E-Learning for a variety of certifications and training in the food industry. I have been able to pitch and implement tools and features that have been beneficial to the efficiency, flow, and overall user experience on StateFoodSafety.com.

These include:
  • Easier product management.
  • Updating all pages to better use templates for faster development and maintenance.
  • Minor integration testing relating to database and client data.
  • Security auditing for common web exploits. (XSS, passwords, information leak, etc…)
  • Small libraries to handle page elements. (modal windows, dynamic page flows, etc…)
  • Updating all pages to be responsive.

I have expanded my knowledge to include technologies and languages that aren't being used at AboveTraining to adapt to new ideas and solutions.
